title: Agility (6C12)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot an Elf to place 2 [Elven] tokens here. Skirmish: Discard this condition or remove an [Elven] token from here to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -1.
Lore:	Elves rely upon more than strength in combat.
Rarity:	C
